title: [Turkey: agriculture]
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Turkey - Social conditions
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Turkey - Social life and customs
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Agriculture - Economic aspects
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Agriculture - Economic aspects
description: A documentary on Turkish agriculture showing how machinery for farming has only recently been introduced although more primitive methods still persist. Shows tobacco farming; the farming and processing of figs and raisins; State Agriculture Institute and their interest in improving livestock; veterinary school with its own radio station; annual agriculture fair. NB: Reel 2 only
